thread.title: Tottenham struggle to spell premium as advert has word spelt in two different ways – both wrong
thread.title_full: Tottenham struggle to spell premium as advert has word spelt in two different ways – both wrong

author: tsheen
title: Tottenham struggle to spell premium as advert has word spelt in two different ways – both wrong
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TOTTENHAM have been trolled by rival fans – after spelling the word ‘premium’ wrong in TWO different ways on an advert. 
The billboard, which appeared at a London Underground platform was advertising premium packages at the new White Hart Lane . Twitter/Dan Bloom A Spurs poster has the word premium spelt wrong – in two different ways 
But eagle-eyed fans spotted that the word was spelt wrong. 
And not only was it spelt wrong, but it was wrong in two different ways. 
The first mention misses an ‘i’, spelling it premum , while the second swaps an ‘n’ for a ‘m’, spelling it premiun . 
Spurs , of course, were then mocked by rival fans. Spurs stars take a break from training in Barcelona to enjoy a scenic city cycle 
Some Spurs fans were keen to insist it was just a big misunderstanding…
